name: BombFury
description:
You are a military droid trapped in a strange place, you can't walk and your controllers are defective, but you can PUMP BOMBS !!! Use this to walk and attack enemies to try to get out of there.

A: Turn left

B: Turn right

8: Go to front

Space: Jump

X: Pump bombs

Mini jam

This game was made for the Mini Jam 74: Chaos
